Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2008...
Injured on 5/28/2008 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/23/2011...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/29/2011, off Rex Brothers (SF)...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/2012 (Going to NYN: SS A. Simmons. Going to PIT: P P. Clemens)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/2019, off Saul Devera (HOU)...
Injured on 8/28/2019 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 7 weeks...
Released by Pittsburgh on 9/1/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 9/1/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Injured on 10/10/2020 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
